description.narrative: Education Emergency Preparedness and response are implemented in accordance with the CCC., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Adolescent Development, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Education In Emergencies, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Increased number and proportion of children accessing and completing quality basic education
